briefdescription.para: Mission specific version number for VC application.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: An application version number consists of four parts: major version number, minor version number, revision number and mission specific revision number. The mission specific revision number is defined here and the other parts are defined in "vc_version.h".

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: Must be defined as a numeric value that is greater than or equal to zero.

briefdescription.para: Pipe depth for the Scheduler pipe.
Pipe name for the Scheduler pipe.

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: Note, this name must fit in OS_MAX_API_NAME.

briefdescription.para: The SB pend behavior type for the Scheduler pipe.

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: One of: CFE_SB_POLL, CFE_SB_PEND_FOREVER, or the number of milliseconds to wait for a new message (recommended). Note, using CFE_SB_PEND_FOREVER may cause an unresponsive application if no messages arrive on this pipe.

briefdescription.para: The number of WAKEUP messages to reserve on the Scheduler pipe.

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: minimum of 1, max limited to CFE_SB_MAX_PIPE_DEPTH-1. Note the VC_SCH_PIPE_WAKEUP_RESERVED and VC_SCH_PIPE_SEND_HK_RESERVED must be less than VC_SCH_PIPE_DEPTH.

briefdescription.para: The number of SEND_HK messages to reserve on the Scheduler pipe.

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: minimum of 1, max of CFE_SB_MAX_PIPE_DEPTH. Note the VC_SCH_PIPE_WAKEUP_RESERVED and VC_SCH_PIPE_SEND_HK_RESERVED must be less than VC_SCH_PIPE_DEPTH.

briefdescription.para: Pipe depth for the command pipe.
Pipe name for the Scheduler pipe.

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: Note, this name must fit in OS_MAX_API_NAME.

briefdescription.para: The timeout value, in milliseconds, to wait for ES application startup sync.

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: This parameter must be at least 1000 (ms).

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: This parameter must be at least 16 for IPV4.

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: Minimum based on configured device driver requirements.

briefdescription.para: Sleep time micro seconds for interrupted calls.
Wait time for camera data in seconds.
Wait time for camera data in microseconds.
Max timeouts until exiting streaming task.
